name: Gwendolyns Big Day
description:
It's Gwendolyn's Birthday! And you've waited until the last minute to create her present, an immortality potion. Collect the ingredients with your friend Dean and get the potion to Gwendolyn.

There are 8 different endings, each with an illustration to unlock!

This game was created by Anna Marie Garland and Siobain Medina! This is our first time making a game or visual novel, we hope you enjoy it! This was made for the 2021 Spooktober Jam.

Find me, Siobain, @kasper7489 on Instagram and Twitter.

Anna can be found @ amargerie on Instagram and @ anargerie on Twitter.
